main.name: Ted Peters
main.bio: Full Stack Developer with demonstrated experience across the Software Development Lifecycle focused in Javascript. I love the feeling of overcoming difficult challeneges. Whenever I need a breathe of fresh air or to get out of my head I like to go hiking, skateboarding, painting, or if I can cook a nice meal for friends and family I would definitely choose that over all else.
main.contactmessage: If you are interested in contacting me for anything, please email me directly. If you prefer to talk by phone just include your info in your message so I can get back to you as soon as possible.

projects.title: Squawk
projects.category: click here to see the code
projects.description: Uses python web framework, Django. Admin account is created as a super user from the root and has all access to delete users and their posts. Users are validated through Django’s out of the box authentication system. Users are able to view other user’s posts, but cannot modify anything that wasn't created by them. Includes password reset function that will send reset to the users email upon verification. Also provides the user the ability to update their profile with a pictur. Images are stored in an AWS S3 Bucket. Site is hosted by heroku

projects.title: AdvenSure
projects.category: click here to see the code
projects.description: Full Stack “MERN'' Application that uses passport.js and custom hooks for user authorization. Packing list information is updated by 'use effect' hooks. Site is hosted by Heroku

projects.category: click here to see the code
projects.description: Node Js application that will find outdoor activities near the users location using MapBox's API, and supports real time weather alerts around the location of those events using Open Weather Map's API
